commands.name: az network express-route port link list
commands.syntax:
az network express-route port link list --port-name
                                        --resource-group
examples: az network express-route port link list --port-name MyPort --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az network express-route port link show
commands.summary: Get the details of an ExpressRoute link.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route port link show --name
                                        --port-name
                                        --resource-group
examples: az network express-route port link show --name MyLinkExpressRoutePort --port-name MyPort --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az network express-route port link update
commands.summary: Manage MACsec configuration of an ExpressRoute Link.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route port link update --name
                                          --port-name
                                          --resource-group
                                          [--add]
                                          [--admin-state {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                          [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--ids]
                                          [--macsec-cak-secret-identifier]
                                          [--macsec-cipher {GcmAes128, GcmAes256, GcmAesXpn128, GcmAesXpn256}]
                                          [--macsec-ckn-secret-identifier]
                                          [--macsec-sci-state {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--remove]
                                          [--set]
examples: az network express-route port link update --resource-group MyResourceGroup --port-name MyExpressRoutePort --name link1 --macsec-ckn-secret-identifier MacSecCKNSecretID --macsec-cak-secret-identifier MacSecCAKSecretID --macsec-cipher GcmAes128
az network express-route port link update --resource-group MyResourceGroup --port-name MyExpressRoutePort --name link2 --admin-state Enabled

commands.name: az network express-route port link wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az network express-route port link wait [--created]
                                        [--custom]
                                        [--deleted]
                                        [--exists]
                                        [--ids]
                                        [--interval]
                                        [--port-name]
                                        [--resource-group]
                                        [--subscription]
                                        [--timeout]
                                        [--updated]
